doc.after: Do not use articles from Wikipedia as sources Also do not use websites that mirror Wikipedia content or publications that rely on material from Wikipedia as sources Content from a Wikipedia article is not considered reliable unless it is backed up by citing reliable sources Confirm that these sources support the content then use them directly There is also a risk of circular reference when using a Wikipedia article or derivative work as a source
